room_title: Escape room "John Hayden's Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Incredible! So much fun, and the quality of the varied rooms is the best around! Great themes, employees really are wonderful, adding to the whole experience. We've done two rooms already and can't wait to do more.

room_title: Escape room "John Hayden's Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Amazing time and awesome customer service! John Hayden's escape room was our highlight of the night we could not stop talking about it! We will be back to do the other escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "John Hayden's Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Great haunt and had a blast! Actors and actresses were on point! Trapped was great to had a blast!!!

room_title: Escape room "John Hayden's Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Awesome experience! The escape room and the actors who interacted with us was excellent. The animated props were spectacular and the owner was very attentive and accommodating. Definitely worth the experience!

room_title: Escape room "John Hayden's Room" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: This was my second year going and it was good last year, but even better this year with some new things. Surprising, scary, and fun!! There is also a room escape that was challenging and fun. Will definitely be back and recommend to others!!
